item.title: Police raid Raichur hotel, arrest four, rescue six women
item.description:
<![CDATA[Following a tip-off, the Raichur Rural Police carried out a raid on a hotel on the Raichur-Hyderabad Road, arrested four accused and rescued six women from the accused.
According to Superintendent of Police G. Puattamadaiah, the raid was carried out on July 1 to rescue the women who had been brought from various parts of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana for prostitution. They were lured with a large sum of money, he added.
The Superintendent of Police gave the names of the accused as 58-year-old S...]]>
